title: Amawaterways Named 'Best River Cruise' Line During 27th Annual Virtuoso Travel WeekTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Amawaterways Named ‘Best River Cruise’ Line During 27th Annual Virtuoso Travel Week Published on : Friday, August 21, 2015
AmaWaterways, the world’s leading river cruise line, has been named “Best River Cruise Line” for the fourth consecutive year by Virtuoso. The company was presented with the prestigious award on August 13, during a gala dinner that concluded the 27th Annual Virtuoso Travel Week in Las Vegas, NV. The event attracted more than 2,700 attendees, including some of the most prestigious names in luxury travel.
“The entire AmaWaterways team appreciates the recognition of Best River Cruise Line by Virtuoso agents,” said Gary Murphy, AmaWaterways’ Vice President of Sales and Co-owner. “We deeply value our relationship with Virtuoso – when their clients come home happy after experiencing our cruises, it continues to drive sales and add value to this terrific partnership.”
Each year, Virtuoso Travel Week takes place, recognizing the company’s global portfolio of travel partners, as well as the most innovative, admired, and top-performing travel agencies and advisors throughout the United States, Australia and Latin America. Marking the conclusion of the organization’s successful weeklong conference, this year’s event brought together a number of industry movers and shakers, including Virtuoso member agencies and their travel advisors, hotels and resorts, cruise lines, tour operators, preferred destinations and tourism boards, airlines and specialty services.
“We are overjoyed to be presented with this prestigious award by Virtuoso yet again, for the fourth year running,” said Kristin Karst, AmaWaterways’ Executive Vice President and Co-owner. “Our relationship with Virtuoso is incredibly important to us, and this continued recognition is inspiring and motivating to our team, as we push to excel at an even greater level moving forward.”
The Virtuoso Awards allow travel industry peers to recognize each other’s accomplishments. The network’s travel providers vote for agencies and advisors, while agency members vote for preferred suppliers. This year, Virtuoso received more than 12,000 votes in ten different categories.
